articles.author: Jeremy Raff
articles.title: How ICE Pressures Separated Parents to Choose Deportation
articles.description: Immigrants and lawyers say the agency is trying to “coerce or confuse” detainees into thinking deportation is the only way to get their kids back.

articles.title: Vietnamese Refugees' Immigration Fight Started With Atlanta Lawyers
articles.description: Neither Phi Nguyen nor Jess Davis, the Atlanta lawyers who spearheaded the case, had any experience in immigration law when they got started on a massive national class action on behalf of Vietnamese refugees.
